title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\DiskSpec
name: DiskSpec
description:
Represents the spec of disk options.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.DiskSpec

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.boot_disk_type
params.description: Type of the boot disk (default is "pd-ssd"). Valid values: "pd-ssd" (Persistent Disk Solid State Drive) or "pd-standard" (Persistent Disk Hard Disk Drive).

params.name: data.boot_disk_size_gb
params.description: Size in GB of the boot disk (default is 100GB).

methods.name: getBootDiskType
methods.description:
Type of the boot disk (default is "pd-ssd").

Valid values: "pd-ssd" (Persistent Disk Solid State Drive) or "pd-standard" (Persistent Disk Hard Disk Drive).
